DOC.brief_summary: Background Rationale Raltegravir Maraviroc , first class 2 new family antiretroviral drug demonstrate high potency treatment experience naive patient . Both drug appear well tolerate low metabolic toxicity . No data currently available concern combination 2 drug . Hypothesis Maraviroc + Raltegravir potent enough maintain virological efficacy naive patient infected CCR5 HIV-1 previously treat 6 month Maraviroc-Raltegravir-Tenofovir-Emtricitabine combination .
DOC.brief_title: Pilot Study Maraviroc/Raltegravir Naive HIV-1 Patients
DOC.detailed_description: Objectives : - To establish ability Maraviroc-Raltegravir combination maintain HIV-1 viral load < 50 copies/ml week 48 naive patient infected CCR5 HIV-1 , follow initial 6 month phase Maraviroc-Raltegravir-Tenofovir-Emtricitabine combination ( Intent treat strategy analysis ) - To study CD4 progression baseline week 48 - To study time virological failure simplification phase study ( week 24 week 48 ) - To study proportion patient HIV RNA < 50 copies/ml time point - To study kinetics viral load decrease baseline week 12 - To study kinetics proviral DNA decrease baseline week 12 , 24 , 36 48 - To study clinical biological tolerance Maraviroc-Raltegravir combination week 48 Study Design/ Clinical Plan Pilot , multicenter , national , uncontrolled study
